summary: A simple player home with most crafting stations.
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading][b][size=14][color=#3174d2]Strong-Blood Blacksmith[/color][/size][/b][/heading][/center]

A simple player home just outside Whiterun.
Includes most smithing stations, alchemy, enchanting and food pot.
Multiple safe storage chests and interactive bookshelf.
Stables with room to dismount inside.

[center][heading][b][size=4][color=#3174d2]Updated file with follower and merchant now in new mod, House Strong-Blood[/color][/size][/b][/heading][/center]

My other mods
